get.description: Check if the API is running and accessible.

post.description: Create a new story saga with optional chapters.

sagaName.description: Name of the story saga (e.g., 'Prologue', 'Bungo Ono')

sagaDesc.description: Detailed description of the saga's narrative

backgroundMedia.description: URL to the saga's cover media (image or video)

mapImage.description: URL to the map image for the saga

order.description: Display order in the saga list

isPrologue.description: Whether the saga is a prologue

isSelected.description: Whether the saga is selected by default

chapterList.description: List of chapters in the saga

touristSpotId.description: Unique identifier for the tourist spot

chapterDesc.description: Detailed description or content of the story

chapterImage.description: URL to the fictional chapter image

characterNameList.description: List of character names involved in the chapter

realWorldImage.description: URL to the real-world location image

chapterVideoUrl.description: URL to the chapter video for desktop viewing

chapterVideoMobileUrl.description: URL to the chapter video optimized for mobile

chapterPdfUrl.description: URL to the downloadable PDF version

isUnlocked.description: Whether the chapter is available to users without prerequisites

get.description: Tests the security headers set by SecurityMiddleware. Returns all configured security headers in the response.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

get.description: Tests the rate limiting middleware. Limited to 3 requests per second.

X-RateLimit-Reset.description: Time until rate limit resets (in seconds)
